name.ja: <ruby>奇<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>跡<rt>せき</rt></ruby>の<ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>進<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>化<rt>か</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card during their turn.

effect.en: Choose 1 face-up Dinosaur Type monster on your field. This turn, that monster cannot be destroyed by card effects. Then, you can Fusion Summon a Level 9 or lower Dinosaur Type monster by shuffling 2 Dinosaur Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck as material.
